#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,result;
	char s[11],rev[11];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s;
		strcpy(rev,s);
                reverse(rev,rev+strlen(rev));
		result=strcmp(rev,s);
		if(result==0) cout<<"YES\n"; else cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
